title: How to Earn a Bell Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Look at the Avid Bell Saver Badge.
steps.description:
You'll need to save a certain amount of bells in your account. This does not mean getting the minimum and withdrawing immediately; the minimum needs to stay in your account until the next day at 6 AM. Bronze rank: Save 1,000,000 (a million) bells
Silver rank: Save 10,000,000 (ten million) bells
Gold rank: Save 100,000,000 (hundred million) bells (ten million) bell profit

steps.headline: Look at the Turnip Trader Badge.
steps.description:
You'll need to make a profit from trading and selling turnips with Joan. Note that profit defines as the number of bells you receive after selling an item. Bronze rank: 500,000 bell profit
Silver rank: 3,000,000 (three million) bell profit
Gold rank: 10,000,000 (ten million) bell profit

steps.headline: Look at the Shopper Badge.
steps.description:
You'll need to spend a certain amount of bells throughout the game. Bronze rank: Spend 500,000 bells
Silver rank: Spend 2,000,000 (two million) bells
Gold rank: Spend 5,000,000 (five million) bells

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons.

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Look at the Avid Bell Saver Badge. You'll need to save a certain amount of bells in your account. This does not mean getting the minimum and withdrawing immediately; the minimum needs to stay in your account until the next day at 6 AM. Bronze rank: Save 1,000,000 (a million) bells
Silver rank: Save 10,000,000 (ten million) bells
Gold rank: Save 100,000,000 (hundred million) bells (ten million) bell profit Look at the Turnip Trader Badge. You'll need to make a profit from trading and selling turnips with Joan. Note that profit defines as the number of bells you receive after selling an item. Bronze rank: 500,000 bell profit
Silver rank: 3,000,000 (three million) bell profit
Gold rank: 10,000,000 (ten million) bell profit Look at the Shopper Badge. You'll need to spend a certain amount of bells throughout the game. Bronze rank: Spend 500,000 bells
Silver rank: Spend 2,000,000 (two million) bells
Gold rank: Spend 5,000,000 (five million) bells Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons. View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
